Wybel Paw.lore: Even reduced to just the bones, you can't help but feel bad for the poor thing this paw came from.

The Exile.lore: This indestructible dagger was found floating in the magma of the Molten Heights, with a lament from its exiled smith carved onto the hilt.

Black.lore: Hewn from the great obsidian spires surrounding the massive Nether gate, this fiercely-hooked dagger absorbs light and magic energy alike to create a desolate void wherever it is wielded.

Upgraded Whisper.lore: The blade seems sharper than normal, but it also seems rather brittle. The smithing was obviously a hack-job...

Jaw Breaker.lore: "Bandit attacks losing you sleep? Free fighting classes here! Only 10  emeralds- they won't know what hit 'em!" -Almuj Self-Defense Class Advertisement

Influence.lore: This knife does not belong in your hands... yet somehow it feels right at home.

Grimtrap.lore: Found at the site of the Caritat Mansion, this simple-looking glove is bathed in dark presence. It wracks those who wear it with pain, and instills the belief that the only way to end the pain is not to remove the item, but to inflict that same torment upon all others.

Iron Knuckle.lore: These bulky-looking gauntlets are actually extremely lightweight, being created of a magical elf-blessed iron alloy blend.

majorIds.Insoluble: +Insoluble: Dissolution now lasts 2.5 seconds, but grants only 35% resistance.

Flameshot Hilt.lore: Found abandoned in the ruins of the Doguns, these odd weapons are designed to shoot jets of sheer flame instead of hitting enemies traditionally. They are in terrible disrepair, and none know how to fix them.

Arma Gauntlet.lore: Stories say that should anyone wield both of these fearsome gauntlets in battle, they will become unkillable in a fight. The second gauntlet, however, has never been found.

Oblivion.lore: This sacrificial kris, fallen from the peak of the Tower of Ascension, is completely hollow. To wield it is to invite to yourself the same hollowness. To become such an aberration, to unwrite yourself in pursuit of power...it must be fed of its wielder til only the barest existence remains.

Abolition.lore: "Those bloody zombies don't kip down at night, what makes you think a curfew might bally-well help?" -General Graken, Nemract Militia

Almuj's Daggers.lore: The reigning king of thieves in Almuj’s underworld would brandish this golden dagger to his enemies so fast, you wouldn’t even realise your wallet was now missing.

majorIds.Soul Eater: +Soul Eater: Devour and Harvester grant double mana. Decreases maximum marks by 1.

Roiling Ruckus.lore: Not knowing what's going on is the best part!

majorIds.Juggle: +Juggle: Stronger Multihit adds an additional 12 hits. All hits are reduced by ÓÄÖ -10%.

Scorpion.lore: This dagger has no blade. Instead, it is layered with the stingers of the Black Shadow Scorpion, which has the ability to vanish entirely from its prey.

Hanafubuki.lore: The most dangerous enemy is one you cannot see. Hidden amidst a flurry of petals comes an avalanche of blows, in one moment dissolving mountains and forests into a growing amalgam, leaving a wake of vibrant bloom in the next.

majorIds.Efflorescence: +Efflorescence: Jasmine Bloom deals increased damage but has reduced vertical range

Alizarin.lore: This bloody palette knife was used to kill only two people before it was abandoned - a killer who broke into a great artist's home, and the artist who struck the blow.

Stabsand.lore: The art of endurance fighting is a skill lost to time. However, a thief that to this day has not been caught, imbued this dagger with the very same ability.

Upgraded HellRaiser.lore: The blade is covered in tape that's been scribbled on in order to make it look fiery. This doesn't seem like a wise purchase.

Locrian.lore: Skien's trust in others was shattered permanently by the wielder of this dagger, who fell to the corruption and attacked his legion during a great corrupted siege.

Hashr Claw.lore: "Betrayal stings sharper than a scorpion's tail, and festers worse than the poison inside."   -Attributed to Hashr

Sitis.lore: Wielding it for too long will leave one a dessicated husk, as this dull blade slowly absorbs all liquids around it.

majorIds.Windsurf: +Windsurf: Righting Reflex lasts twice as long and is affected stronger by movement speed

Ivory.lore: The holy blade of the House of Talor was crafted of pure unicorn horns, and consecrated by a hundred priests. Evil spirits are driven away by its mere presence.

Upgraded Scalpel.lore: The blade actually looks to be of good quality, unlike the other products. The only problem is the questionable stain covering most of it.

Slider.lore: The spelling seems to have been botched.

majorIds.Hurricane's Eye: +Hurricane's Eye: Violent Vortex applies 2 marks to every enemy it hits.

Dislocater.lore: Often, the leader of brute gangs would use this dagger to threaten his followers into making sure they did not fail him.

Impulse.lore: Prolonged exposure to the corruption may cause sudden bursts of madness in soldiers. To assure themselves of their sanity, some have even begun to play tricks on their brethren.

Nullification.lore: The diminutive stature of this item belies its abilities. Absorbing and expelling magical energy in precise bursts, it protects the user from all manner of attacks while punishing those who dare strike.

Blade of Shade.lore: The fabled weapon of the titular dark Assassin, the blade's small stature hides its true powers. Shadows undulate about the hilt.

Archangel.lore: The unwieldy, yet imposing stature of this massive sickle strikes awe into those who view it. Those who have the will to wield it, however, seem to garner respect from all those around them, as though they had become a god.

Brass Brand.lore: Built by Cerid to accrue raw static charge from the surroundings and direct it at opponents, the blade's chief failing is that the wielder is not rendered immune to their own discharge as intended.

Styx's Grab.lore: "Never wish to see a dead loved one again. In this day and age, they'll come back to see you." -Mylo, Nemract Conscript

Chakram.lore: Despite appearing as a basic blade when held, strange spiritual magic changes its form into a sharp, ring-like cutting edge when used to attack. Only one person was known to master the weapon's abilities.

Fangs.lore: "Not every spider is venomous, but do you really want to get bitten by them all to figure out which are?" -Alvin, Nivla Forest Resident

Infused Hive Dagger.lore: Deceptively plain-looking, this dagger has been infused with energy from all five known elements. It leaves afterimages that pulsate in a spectrum of colors.

majorIds.Flurry of Blows: +Flurry of Blows: Turn Double Slice into a 10-hit pummeling of 16% damage per hit

Weathered.lore: A relic of the past in Time Valley was weathered down to a dagger by the sheer power of the wind. When used in battle, mysterious intertwined wind and time magic give it no physical presence.

majorIds.Roving Assassin: +Roving Assassin: Vanish will no longer block mana and health regeneration

Cataclysm.lore: Despite the existence of the Nether Portal, few believe that it is possible to open such rifts with sheer force alone. None believe that a tool with enough power to accomplish such a monumental feat could exist. And yet...

Inferno.lore: The Dogun God Garaheth was actually an immense fire demon occupying the bowels of Molten Heights. Although unwise, the Dwarves forged a demonic dagger using his tooth in celebration of his slaughter.

Thrunda Ripsaw.lore: Combined power of inscribed Uth runes and consuming fury combine to create a deadly aura, as this weapon is merely a spiritual extension of the user's desire for utter cataclysm.

Syncope.lore: The soul of a Devil is so hot with hatred that their  bodies melt like candle wax, coming off in molten globs of flesh until only black bones remain.

majorIds.Heat Shimmer: +Heat Shimmer: Your Clones are reduced to a maximum of 1 with no damage penalties and Mirror Image's cooldown is greatly shortened.

Infinitesimal.lore: For when one needs to carve the smallest stone or pick the smallest lock, the subtleties of precision approach impossibility.

Rewind.lore: Time moves in strange ways around this translucent blade, speeding and slowing, starting and stopping, with no observable reasoning or pattern.

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

Olux's Prized Dagger.lore: This expertly crafted dagger was smithed by a cryptid-researching fanatic. It can chop through even the thickest of the swamp's clay with ease.

Blossom Haze.lore: And as the spring bursts, the blossom petals flutter in the wind amongst the ashes of your enemies.

majorIds.Cherry Bombs: +Cherry Bombs: Turn Smoke Bomb into three firecrackers that fly farther, tighter, and deal high damage instantly

The Divide.lore: Once having held unstoppable amounts of magic, being forced to fuse into one form locked away all but the smallest sliver of their power.

Nirvana.lore: Spiritual enlightenment is a goal that many monks hope to one day grasp the barest glimpse of, often thought to be a goal that must be worked towards over a lifetime. Holding this polished, translucent blade will instantly induce that lofty state until it is let go.

majorIds.Transcendence: +Transcendence: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted

Blazing Ruin.lore: One who forsook all others in pursuit of their own gain forced an extension of their own will into existence. This culmination of that will consumes all it touches.

majorIds.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health

Reaper of Soul.lore: A grave digger uncovered this blade from the resting place of a notorious pirate that pillaged the islands of the ocean for four decades.

Defibrillator.lore: "The first time I saw one of those zombies I nearly had a heart attack! The blighters are terrifying." -Rynend, Maltic Citizen

Silver Fusion Ring.lore: This ring, covered in colorful artifical gems, seems to awaken a strong elemental affinity in you. With some improvements to its core, it could become even better...

majorIds.Coagulate: +Coagulate: Blood Connection launches you further and higher upon teleporting to a nearby totem

Gold Static Ring.lore: The strong shock coming from this advanced version of the ring is a small price for its power, but it has yet to reach its peak.

Summa.lore: An auxiliary power core of the powerful TERA-4M Mining robot line. It controls the robots by giving the bearer a compulsion to break new grounds and progress further without heed.

Obstinance.lore: "The protector will keep us safe even after this! It has to, it must, it—"

majorIds.Power Fist: +Power Fist: Striking enemies with an empty hand greatly knocks them back

Silver Fiber Ring.lore: This crude looking ring utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains a whispering.

Lodestone.lore: The magical oddity known as lodestone has been studied for years as an active counterpart to quartz's passive magical properties. Research continues, but it is valuable when creating magical items.

Gold Hydro Ring.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant insisted. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?

Precious.lore: A strange magic attracts you to this ring. Maybe you shouldn't tell anyone about its existence?

Cracked Stonehall.lore: It looks like someone tried and failed to improve it. The re-smithing job was obviously rushed...

Dispersion.lore: "The lucky ones perished in the abyss. It’s only a matter of time before the land picks us survivors off one by one."

Silver Solar Ring.lore: The device forged into this simple ring seems to absorb heat. You feel a bit lukewarm when wearing it...

Martyr.lore: A recently married man went off to war wearing this wedding ring. Though he perished in battle, his courage and determination empowers all who wear it.

majorIds.Flashfreeze: +Flashfreeze: Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s

Cold Wave.lore: Feeling the fresh chill of the cold air is all you need to know you're really alive.

Sticky Decoder Ring.lore: Each one is welded stuck to just one letter. Apparently, to decode the special Rymek message, you need to buy twenty six. ...do they think you're a fool?

Silver Hydro Ring.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.

Chipped Glitz.lore: There are little chips and cracks all over this... was someone trying to break it down for gold?

majorIds.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health

Old Keeper's Ring.lore: Found on the corpse of the oldest shopkeeper of the Gavel province, the engraved text reads 'GREED'.

Black Catalyst.lore: Even simply looking at these odd rings gives way to a compulsion to wear two of them, despite all better judgement.

Rarity.lore: Being one of the absolute rarest treasures in the world, it seems to have a mind of its own, only showing itself when a stroke of luck is had.

Unspeakable.lore: The wielders of this cursed glassen bauble are rendered mute. The effect is reversed after the item is removed, but the longer it is worn, the longer the curse remains.

Field.lore: "After the Nivla forest fire, I'm glad the corrupteds haven't thought to try and burn the Detlas Suburbs." -Sergeant Klafson, Detlas Legion

Diamond Fusion Ring.lore: This mighty ring is the crown jewel amongst elemental rings. Wearing it, your knowledge is no longer limited to a few elements.

Symbiont.lore: Survival is the shared interest of those in the wilds.

Gold Steam Ring.lore: While this model of the Steam Ring is far superior to its predecessor, there still lies the capacity for one more upgrade. The jewel of the ring is crystal clear.

Law of the Jungle.lore: An uncountably old relic of Time Valley which has changed owners only through death, there is an inscription carved on it: '‚í†‚íú‚íØ ‚í™‚í≠ ‚íù‚í† ‚í†‚íú‚íØ‚í†‚í©'

Kaze.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] Gentle spirits of the wind attract themselves to the brilliant jewels slotted into this ring, bringing peace to its wearers and those around them.

Spider Ring.lore: "Crawly things. They crawl on the mushrooms. Mushrooms shouldn't be crawly!" -Yahya, Mushroom Man

Gold Fusion Ring.lore: This ring, covered in colorful artifical gems, seems to awaken a powerful elemental force in you. Though stronger than the previous model, its true potential stays sealed.

Gold Fiber Ring.lore: This improved ring utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You can sense a rhythm with each step...

Intensity.lore: The runes carved into this simple gold ring translate into various words meaning power. It amplifies elemental energies in inexplicable ways.

Cacophony.lore: Let their souls sing your chorus of victory.

Diamond Hydro Ring.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant said, and no word was a lie. With this ring on your finger, you could catch a gnat without looking.

Broken Sandust.lore: The silver looks rather tarnished...does he expect you to believe that "gem" isn't just a cheap glass bauble?

Misshapen Libella.lore: It's completely impossible to use this for its intended purpose now. It barely can fit on your finger as is.

Diamond Solar Ring.lore: The device forged into this flawless ring draws all heat from its surrounding. Though it almost burns, you can feel your abilites enhance.

Extinction.lore: The Decay swept away countless species. As those memories die, they are lost forever.

Concentration.lore: The forger of this ring had to endure 30 long days of smelting various metals only found in the ocean. A single mistake would ruin the creation. The mystic metals are said to seep into the wearers skin to gently replenish their resolve.

Marvel.lore: The stellar quality of the coral jewels set into the ring comes from a magical purification process, involving a decade-long soak in mystical Gylia water.

Forbearance.lore: An anomaly of restriction, for the protectors who seek purpose outside of reality.

Silver Static Ring.lore: Though it's hard to touch the plain, mechanical ring without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...

Gold Solar Ring.lore: The device forged into this advanced ring seems to absorb heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your hand...

Rycar's Elation.lore: Created from the lip of a wine bottle and dropped in the mystic waters of Lake Gylia, this glass ring seems to follow Rycar's drunken escapades wherever she wanders.

Athanasia.lore: May your triumphs live eternal and never fade.

Diamond Fiber Ring.lore: This masterpiece of a ring utilizes powerful electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Wearing it, you can feel a deep connection to the ground below.

Ingress.lore: An anomaly of invasion, for the explorers who seek purpose outside of reality.

Diamond Static Ring.lore: The heavy electrical impulses coming from this ring would be lethal under normal circumstances, but the only thing its wearer senses is pure power. A true masterpiece of engineering.

Prism.lore: The jewel on this ring is found very rarely deep beneath the Light Forest. It has the power to manipulate light itself.

Downfall.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] A fallen link from a chainmail hauberk of an older time, this ring fell from a giant taller than a mountain. As it sped through the air and  gained momentum, it traveled so fast that it was battered to a tenth of its size.

Bronze Basic Ring.lore: This ring is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.

Dulled Amethyst Ring.lore: The merchant insists the gem is real. It's easy to tell that the issue is the quality of the gem, though...

Diamond Steam Ring.lore: Users of this perfect model of Legendary Island's steam-powered ring have reported feeling weightless in combat. The jewel of the ring is a perfectly clear diamond.

Silver Steam Ring.lore: This prototype model of the Steam Ring increases the user's agility in combat. The jewel of the ring is crystal clear.

Silver Solar Necklace.lore: The device forged into this basic necklace seems to gather heat. You can feel a warm sting when holding it.

Altum Spatium.lore: Even looking at this pendant strains your eyes. Should it even exist?

Silver Steam Necklace.lore: Despite the size of the large jewel hanging from this necklace, it doesn't feel heavy at all. However, the necklace's mechanisms seem incomplete.

Silver Fusion Necklace.lore: This necklace, decorated with bright jewels, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. There are many upgrades to be made before it reaches its full potential.

Wynnterfest 2016 Souvenir.lore: Thank you for participating in Wynnterfest 2016!

Gold Solar Necklace.lore: The device forged into this advanced necklace seems to gather heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your neck...

Bronze Basic Necklace.lore: This necklace is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.

Necklace of a Thousand Storms.lore: Sealed away by the Avos of the old days to prevent it from falling into the wrong hands, this necklace was enchanted to strengthen its wearers spiritual link to nature itself.

Silver Fiber Necklace.lore: This crude looking necklace utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains quiet.

Diamond Solar Necklace.lore: The masterpiece of a necklace gathers all heat from its surrounding. It is fed to its wearer to maximize the strength of attacks.

Master.lore: Although not truly magical by any means, the sheer craftsmanship of this ornate broach makes its wearers feel skillful.

Wynnter Fair 2016 Souvenir.lore: Thank you for participating in the 2016 Wynnter Fair!

Diamond Hydro Necklace.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said and every word was true. With this necklace equipped, you could hear the ocean whisper.

Abrasion.lore: "The fractures have ground the land to dust, our home to ruin, and our people to nothing."

Planet Healer.lore: The jewels in this necklace naturally draw darkness and corruption into its wearer, purifying the land around them at the cost of their own life.

Hexed Amulet.lore: Although the warlock's curse placed upon this simple, Olux-crafted charm will reduce the abilities of the wearer significantly, its original luck-bolstering properties still are in place.

Royal Shocking Amulet.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It crackles with a chaotic energy.

Ensa's Faith.lore: The scholar-priest Ensa created this pendant as a personal prayer while his home was under siege. It is rumored to hold the key to enlightenment, but it is unknown as to how.

Legendary Medallion.lore: This medallion marks its wearer as a true champion. It is awarded to those who have put an unnecessary amount of time into attempting the Legendary Challenge.

Abyssal Amulet.lore: Used by the Order of the Abyss to aid their summoning rituals, it contains a strange, fiery energy. It has ties with a terrible demon...

Royal Cyclone Amulet.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It whistles with an invigorating tune.

Eyes on All.lore: A presence of despair watches over the swamp as the Decay spreads.

Ambivalence.lore: "It's all doomed anyway. If you don't care, nothing can hurt you." - Zamugnia, Lost Lutho Citizen

Shatterglass.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] This small, rough-crafted pendant is the only known magic artifact of the Orcs. It incites destructive tendencies within the wearer.

majorIds.Insoluble: +Insoluble: Dissolution now lasts 2.5 seconds, but grants only 35% resistance.

Durum's Serenity.lore: Carried by the Durum Protector, this small necklace holds but an ounce of the vibrance and life of the Durum Isles.

Apex Predator.lore: Something must always rule the ecosystem, even one as warped as this.

Contrast.lore: The runes carved onto the gold beads strung along this simple necklace translate into various words meaning variance. It provides many abilities though unexplainable means.

Reckoning.lore: Come to terms with your godlike judgment.

Royal Blazing Amulet.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It glows with a comforting warmth.

Recalcitrance.lore: "The omens, the warnings, they were right there, and we stood by and did nothing."

majorIds.Taunt: +Taunt: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

Found Footage.lore: Despite heavy damage, this memory core recovered from a fallen Despermech remains usable. Sifting through its contents paints a clear yet brutal picture of the destruction the rogue creations have caused.

majorIds.Lunge: +Lunge: Hop and Leap's horizontal velocity is greatly increased

Daredevil.lore: The mangled body found days too late apparently thought this necklace would let them traverse between geysers into the Upper Heights.

Gold Hydro Necklace.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?

Tenuto.lore: This strange pendant has been known to dilate time around the wearer, slowing their movements while greatly augmenting their power.

Simulacrum.lore: An anomaly of replication, for the assemblers who seek purpose outside of reality.

Wynnter Fair 2017 Souvenir.lore: Thank you for participating in the 2017 Wynnter Fair!

Silver Static Necklace.lore: Though it's hard to touch the plain, tech-enhanced necklace without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...

Royal Stormy Amulet.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It pulsates with a calming aura.

Gold Static Necklace.lore: The strong shock coming from this improved version of the necklace is a small price for its strength, but it has yet to reach its peak.

Adder Stone.lore: Aldorei charms are often shared and tinkered with by gifted Elves within the commune. Though simple, the stones blessed by elven magic provide soothing energy to the wearer.

Royal Dusty Amulet.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It shines with a powerful strength.

Witherhead's Talisman.lore: "My dear boy should never have to go through the horrors of losing a mother like that." -Momo, adoptive mother of Bob

Collection.lore: An anomaly of adoption, for the caretakers who seek purpose outside of reality.

Gold Fusion Necklace.lore: This necklace, decorated with bright jewels, uses advanced nano-technology to boost its users elemental abilities. Though powerful, there are still a few flaws to be fixed.

Gold Steam Necklace.lore: The jewel hanging from this necklace is said to be weightless. While still very powerful, its full potential has yet to be achieved.

Diamond Fiber Necklace.lore: This ultimate version of a necklace was given to less than a handful of adventurers. Once on your neck, you can communicate with the ground below as if you grew roots.

Metamorphosis.lore: What you have seen will mark you forever.

Silver Hydro Necklace.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.

Gold Fiber Necklace.lore: This improved version of a bracelet utilizes rare electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You notice a rhythm with each step...

Diamond Steam Necklace.lore: This necklace is the pinnacle of steam-powered technology. Despite the size of the large jewel hanging from the necklace, it doesn't feel heavy at all.

Stellar.lore: Elementally attuned gemstones are melded together to form the singular marvel found on this pendant. Despite the violent smithing process, the jewel is utterly flawless.

Diamond Static Necklace.lore: The lethal amount of electricity emmited from this often desired necklace fails to kill you, as its pure energy runs through your veins.

Diamond Fusion Necklace.lore: Unlike any other invention this necklace enhances your power and understanding of the elements tenfold. The colorful jewels used are almost dizzying you.

Diamond Fiber Bracelet.lore: Desired by many of the countless challengers, this bracelet allows you to sense movements over thousands of meters away. It is decorated with rough yet beautiful jewels.

Binding Brace.lore: An oppressively dark aura emanates from this shackle, dampening both the will and magic potency of those that wear it.

Silver Static Bracelet.lore: Though it's hard to touch the simple, mechanical bracelet without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...

Diamond Solar Bracelet.lore: The device forged into this perfected bracelet drains all heat from its surroundings. Though it almost burns, you can feel your power growing

Weighted Nimble Fingers.lore: The extra metal on the glove completely defeats the purpose... It's unclear why it was re-smithed like this.

Jiandan Handwraps.lore: The cloth wraps produced by the canyon Dojo are just that, merely soft cloth. It is left to the users to apply them skillfully in battle, in whatever way they see fit.

Remikas' Authority.lore: This plain-looking silver bracer is one of the last surviving heirlooms of the first Gavellian king, to be passed down to his heirs. The shimmering metal is said to contain Remikas' soul within it.

Bronze Basic Bracelet.lore: This bracelet is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.

majorIds.Magnet: +Magnet: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you

Ra.lore: Undecipherable symbols are carved into this long arm band, though the fiery glow and bright jewel has led archaeologists to believe it is somehow related to the sun.

Succession.lore: "I pray that those who have heeded the wise one’s warning have survived. The canyon must not meet this fate."

Silver Fiber Bracelet.lore: This rough looking bracelet utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains a whispering.

Knucklebones.lore: An old Nemract saying is engraved along the metal. "A single toss of the knucklebones can make or break a gambling man."

Anya's Penumbra.lore: "The lightest light will never defeat the darkest dark. Only those who understand both can survive."

majorIds.Entropy: +Entropy: Meteor falls three times faster

Silver Steam Bracelet.lore: Users who have worn this early model of the Steam Bracelet have reported that they have felt "one with the wind" while wearing it.

majorIds.Freerunner: +Freerunner: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%

Provenance.lore: Your success heralds the beginning of something new.

Compliance.lore: "All of our faith, all of our worship, and we were rewarded with the apocalypse."

Diamond Hydro Bracelet.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said, and no word was a lie. With this bracelet on your arm you could ride a wave with your bare feet.

Gold Steam Bracelet.lore: This impressive bracelet is in high demand. Those who have obtained it say that they feel as if they're "one with the wind" when wearing it.

Diamond Fusion Bracelet.lore: This bracelet opens up its wearers spirit, filling it with pure elemental knowledge. The ornaments decorating it are without peer.

majorIds.Lightweight: +Lightweight: You no longer take fall damage

requirements.quest: Realm of Light V - The Realm of Light

Gold Fiber Bracelet.lore: This rough looking bracelet utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You can feel a rhythm with each step...

majorIds.Madness: +Madness: Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds

Diamond Static Bracelet.lore: The heavy shocks coming from this perfected bracelet would be lethal under normal circumstances, but the only thing its wearer senses is the enhancement of power.

Diamond Steam Bracelet.lore: This steam-powered bracelet is sought by many challengers of the Legendary Challenge. They say that they feel as if they're "one with the wind" when wearing it.

Silver Fusion Bracelet.lore: This bracelet, decorated with simple ornaments, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. There are many upgrades to be made before it reaches its full potential.

Buster Bracer.lore: A mighty, earth-shatteringly powerful weapon was destroyed for fear of its raw power, and the pieces buried. They were unearthed decades later, and were reforged into various items including this sturdy bracer.

Silver Hydro Bracelet.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.

Breakthrough.lore: An anomaly of destruction, for the conquerors who seek purpose outside of reality.

Momentum.lore: This golden cuff has an odd time dilation effect surrounding it, slowing all movements significantly, but multiplying the force of impact to a significant degree.

Gold Static Bracelet.lore: The painful shock coming from this improved version of the ring is a small price for its power, but it has yet to reach its peak.

Follow the Wind.lore: A lost relic from the Wind Fortress, a mythical stronghold of the Sky Islands that fell into the Void long ago. A small mechanism within the bracelet points towards its place of origin.

majorIds.Find Thyself: +Find Thyself: Masquerade now grants 75 Mana after switching between Masks 3 times.

Black Space.lore: Give yourself to darkness, and in darkness, answers will take shape.

Gold Fusion Bracelet.lore: This bracelet, decorated with complex ornaments, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. Though powerful, there's still a lot to improve.

Vitre.lore: "They say the eyes are the windows to the soul. That's ridiculous, ocular fluids are primarily opaque." -Ragon, Elemental Researcher

Detachment.lore: An anomaly of separation, for the wanderers who seek purpose outside of reality.

Veneration.lore: Revel in the respect you've finally earned.

Diluted Vitriol.lore: The glass capsule holding the poison vial is too cloudy to see what's inside. The merchant's reassurances are anything but.

Gold Hydro Bracelet.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?

Prowess.lore: The runes carved into this simple gold cuff translate into various words meaning mastery. It amplifies the ability of the wearer in mysterious ways.

Call to Concord.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] Reverberating with the bravery and residual strength of fallen Wynn soldiers, every casualty only serves to harden the resolve it instills in the wearer.

Gold Solar Bracelet.lore: The device forged into this improved bracelet seems to gather heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your arm...

Used Wolf Paw.lore: It looks more like a dog paw to you, but you don't feel like risking your life arguing with the merchant.

Atavistic.lore: In the wake of the Decay, the land yearns to return to its old vibrance.

Homeorhesis.lore: Stability is not necessarily found in stasis, but predictability.

Silver Solar Bracelet.lore: The device forged into this simple bracelet seems to gather heat. You feel a bit lukewarm when wearing it...

Freedom.lore: Freedom of soul, mind, and body are forced upon all those that this bow's arrows impact, and freedom of caring from the atrocities that such a dangerous weapon can inflict is given to all those that hold it.

Return to Ether.lore: This enigmatic weapon can suddenly blink out of reality with no warning only to appear exactly where it was left later. Artificers have determined that almost the entire bow, by all known laws of nature and magic, should not exist.

Death's Reach.lore: "We'll ensure that under our watch, all your families will be reunited!" -Haros, of the Banished Legion

Deadeye.lore: The weapon of the fearsome lone bandit, Rymek Luke, it is unique in that it is designed to fire small metal rounds instead of more traditional projectiles.

majorIds.Hawkeye: +Hawkeye: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal ÓÄÖ 10%, ÓÄÉ 1%, and ÓÄÄ 1%

Spring.lore: Arrows fired by this bow are pure ice, but when they hit the enemy, burst into magical water, flash-freezing all that it touches. The frost burns will never heal.

Ignis.lore: This bow, used by the dwarves to land the final blow in the slaughter of Garaheth is extremely powerful. Special, fire resistant gloves must be worn at all times to prevent burns to the user.

majorIds.Heart of the Pack: +Heart of the Pack: Nearby players gain 75% of the health you naturally regenerate

Skin Piercer.lore: The average bow can boast a range of skills, but unlike this one, not every bow can penetrate through any organic skin, including dragon hide.

Miasma.lore: "I have to wonder just how healthy slime found in the depths of a desert  cavern can be to drink." -Eluzterp, Almuj resident

Chaser.lore: "My husband's such a scaredy-cat. What good is tomb raiding if you're not in the tomb?"  -Dr. Junes, Almuj Archaeologist

Az.lore: Mysterious runes, held by inexplicable ancient guardians, were once moulded together for study purposes. The experiment went awry, as the runic words Nii, Az, and Ek were combined in a reaction that resulted in the collapse of a civilization.

Infinity.lore: If you reach for ammunition from your quiver, as long as you have a single arrow, you will find you never run out.

majorIds.Evershot: +Evershot: Arrow Hurricane becomes a consistent, straight stream of arrows with a slower fire rate, dealing greater knockback and double damage per arrow

Epoch.lore: This ornate bow holds a sinister beauty. Each rediscovery marks impending disaster, against any force that attempts to overcome it. Such is the inevitability of fate: irreverent to the will of masses, an epoch starts anew.

Clairvoyance.lore: The powerful psychic energies surrounding this bow are rumored to increase accuracy, though this has not been refuted by any reliable source.

Nemract's Rage.lore: A year-long monsoon soaked this Nemract-made bow so much, that it has harnessed the very essence of water.

Divzer.lore: Unruly magics of void and darkness are tamed within this bow's string. While those energies are never to be released, arrows fired from it fire at such blinding speeds so as to phase out of existence when they hit their target.

Mesarock Arch.lore: The two mesa tribes once were allies until their sacred totems were stolen. Before that time, however, they often shared their talents, and this bow hewn from mesa stone was one such lost craft.

Witherhead's Bow.lore: Wielded by the master of the Decrepit Sewers Dungeon, the arrows of this bow causes the target's body to slowly wither away.

majorIds.Fallout: +Fallout: Bomb Arrow's blast becomes giant. Damage, self-damage, and recoil are severely increased

Upgraded Cursed Bow.lore: "100% curse-free or your money back!" The merchant explained that this policy is not legally binding after you read it.

Spiritshock.lore: Potentially one of the most dangerous weapons in existence. A precise enough shot can destroy the soul of those it hits.

Stinger.lore: If it weren't for that stray mark, this would be spelled correctly...

Zero.lore: The unstable power within this bow is capable of great destruction, but seems to zero out at the most crucial moments in battle. Only the most skillful archers can wield this weapon with confidence.

Cluster.lore: Perhaps one is weak. To be ignored. Perhaps two are not much better. But what of five? Ten? Twenty?...

Thunderbolt.lore: This bow has no string. Instead, a thin lightning-like thread is strung upon it. It is said to be limited only by the speed of the user.

Web Spitter.lore: "And you thought walking into a cobweb was bad." -Ope, Ragni Botanist

Eruption.lore: No one expected the WynnExcavation volcanic site to produce any valuable materials, but this heavy, obsidian-blend bow silenced the critics.

Soundwave.lore: This bow's thick string fails to shoot arrows effectively, but instead produces low frequency sound waves that erupt from the source in all directions. The sound can implode the eardrums of an enemy with a single strum.

Heracul.lore: Reconstructed from mere wooden scraps of its former self, this extremely heavy crossbow still contains immense power. It was intended for use with a lost suit of armor, of which only one piece remains.

Torrential Tide.lore: The tides of the ocean, once bound, became useful magic power sources. They were once utilized for weapons, but to harness the unstable force of the raging sea was considered too dangerous.

Upgraded Radiance.lore: The craftsmanship on this bow is rather poor. The paint on the "crystals" is chipping...

Labyrinth.lore: Left. Right. Left. Right. They are desperate for an escape, merely playthings in a maze of your design. Left. Left. Right.  Turn back. When mountains of stone can shift at your command, their world is reduced to a single path. Left. Right. Does it ever end?

majorIds.Twisting Threads: +Twisting Threads: Tangled Trap ropes become much stronger. Gain +12 traps that instantly arm but are severely weakened

Iron String.lore: Many said making a bow out of iron would be slow and wasteful, but the weight of the iron arrow can pierce even stone.

Hellstrand.lore: The Order of the Abyss crafted this bow in opposition to the House of Talor's holy relic. Holding it for too long will strain and warp the user's mind.

majorIds.Frenetic Spirit: +Frenetic Spirit: Guardian Angels deal almost no damage, but shoots faster and expires much slower. Frenzy's cap is increased to 125%.

majorIds.Freerunner: +Freerunner: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%

Damnation.lore: "I got a name, known far and wide! Run along, you bandit scum, before you have to learn it the hard way!" -Sayleros' Brother, killed by bandits

Gale's Force.lore: Those who have used this near-weightless bow all seem to tell tales of how they see Gale's spirit fighting alongside them.

Wanderer's Purpose.lore: To look and say “I will go there,” and to keep going until you find it... that’s what’s important.

majorIds.Seeking Module: +Seeking Module: Homing Shots track towards nearby enemies much more aggressively.

Glacial Crest.lore: Used for endurance training on the Icy Islands, this bow forces the wielder's body temperature to drop to near-hypothermic levels.

Hesperium.lore: Watch as they receive your gift of imminent disaster and endless fallout.

majorIds.Fission: +Fission: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong

Stratiformis.lore: The Elves managed to harness the power of air itself, forming a bow made entirely of air currents, allowing the user to move swift like the wind, but vulnerable to attacks.

Olux's Prized Bow.lore: This expertly crafted bow was whittled by a cryptid-researching fanatic. Its frame was cut from the very toughest tree roots.

Recursion.lore: To call an end a new beginning implies there ever was a beginning, or ever will be an end.

majorIds.Vedette: +Vedette: Focus is stronger, and caps at 2. Crepuscular Ray can be cast at 2 Focus with decreased Focus drain, launching you into the air and immobilizing you.

majorIds.Forest's Blessing: +Forest's Blessing: Your archer summons have increased movement speed, attack speed, and vision. Arrow Bomb's damage is reduced by ÓÄÖ -30%

Grandmother.lore: The very first crossbow in existence was claimed to be utterly indestructible, but it is only true to a fault. The item cannot be broken, but solely because all damage to it is instead reflected onto the user. As its age is uncountably ancient, wielders will find themselves rapidly aging and withering away with even a mere touch.

Upgraded Long Bow.lore: Apparently, they thought to make a long bow better, they should make it longer. You can barely hold it.

Stale.lore: "There's never new water flowing into those sewers. It all cycles back into itself...not natural." -Jenprest, Ragni Legion 2nd Division

Maelstrom.lore: Lost by master sailor Carvel in a massive storm, it was carried all the way out to the city of Selchar, where it was found spewing seafoam and lightning bolts.

majorIds.Fallout: +Fallout: Bomb Arrow's blast becomes giant. Damage, self-damage, and recoil are severely increased

Alka Cometflinger.lore: Combined power of inscribed Uth runes and raw potential fuse to create an imposing presence, as this weapon is merely a spiritual extension of the user's desire for complete obliteration.

Infused Hive Bow.lore: Deceptively plain-looking, this bow has been infused with energy from all five known elements. Its string radiates a spectrum of colors.

Crackshot.lore: This heavy crossbow forces a strange compulsion in its users when wielded. They will often refuse to even shoot unless entirely certain of a hit.

Relic.lore: Despite being proven unrelated, this enigmatic bow was the lynchpin to beginning the great search for the Relics.

majorIds.Strings of Fate: +Strings of Fate: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds, and deal double damage with attacks and explosions.

Upgraded Echolocation.lore: Did the merchant really think that adding severed bat wings to the weapon would make it more authentic?

Olympic.lore: When one has climbed the highest mountain, traversed the vastest plain, what is left to conquer? One challenges the human limit, and attempts to push beyond what any has accomplished before. Sculpted in honor of the first champion, this idol emboldens you to best your greatest opponent: yourself.

Olux's Prized Relik.lore: This expertly crafted relik was notched by a cryptid-researching fanatic. Its feathers and baubles chime with a soothing melody.

Toxoplasmosis.lore: Can you feel the burning inside? Something has made itself at home. Time to tuck away the parts of you it has no need for, to shuffle your little brain around so you may Carry. Carry and Spread. Give it a new home—melting you down is how it says thank you. Be grateful, won't you?

majorIds.Geocentrism: +Geocentrism: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time

majorIds.Sublimation: +Sublimation: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount, with reduced Totem area of effect

Hourglass.lore: "I saw that spider queen once. It felt like it was only a matter of time before she found my home, so I moved here." -Babhla, Nivla Bowl Merchant

Upgraded Melange.lore: There are parts from at least six separately recognizable weapons mashed together to make this. There's no way it's effective.

Lower.lore: The name has got to be misspelled... It doesn't even make any sense!

majorIds.Totemic Fuse: +Totemic Fuse: Totemic Smash doubles in radius and deals extra damage but Totem lasts half as long.

Upgraded Flare Blitz.lore: The weapon nearly catches fire during the merchant's demonstration. He still refuses to discount it despite this.

Cryoseism.lore: One of the first dwarven theories of the increasing quakes in east Gavel was that the freezing of a Dogun town in the Heights also froze a massive underground spring, disrupting the earth and chain-reacting across the province.

Overdrive.lore: Holding this relik sends sparks through your veins, making your heart beat fast. And faster. And faster and faster and--

Sunstar.lore: Once known as the Doomsday Weapon, it was ultimately never used for its intended purpose - its solar focus was cracked upon the day of its completion. All but a fraction of its energy was expelled, obliterating its creators, but overwhelming magical force still pulses and thrums through the web of fractures in its design.

Narcissist.lore: The world revolves around you, after all. It's high time you spread the news!

majorIds.Geocentrism: +Geocentrism: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time

Resonance.lore: The power to join oneself with the lifeblood of the earth has long eluded sects of fanatical druids and shamans. One such cult found a way, and subsequently wiped itself out in the process, their flesh turning to stone and veins forming new rivers.

majorIds.Lifestream: +Lifestream: Increases Blood Sorrow's damage and overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.

Panic Zealot.lore: They must know what you went through. They must suffer the same as you did.

majorIds.Furious Effigy: +Furious Effigy: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

majorIds.Peaceful Effigy: +Peaceful Effigy: Your Totem will last twice as long

majorIds.Dead Weight: +Dead Weight: Totem's horizontal velocity is greatly increased at the cost of vertical movement

Decaybound Spindle.lore: Decay spreads unseen, but you know it spreads, and that is enough.

majorIds.Gruesome Knots: +Gruesome Knots: Twisted Tether spends three times as much of your Blood Pool ‚öï to deal double damage

Fantasia.lore: The confusion of sentience creates unknown and marvelous threads and soundscapes. Joy, grief, hate, love, shock, calm, they reflect back into the pattern and song of the universe. The glow of the Weave, and this brilliant, breathtaking, pale imitation of it, too, resounds in the chorus of existence—one extra layer.

Tachypsychia.lore: You will probably irreversibly harm yourself with this, but when has that ever stopped you?

majorIds.Furious Effigy: +Furious Effigy: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

Tremolo.lore: "It feels like all these "ancient" civilizations have better tech than we do nowadays."  -Knox, Corkus Immigrant and Sandstorm Vandals bandit

Absolution.lore: A deep regret stains this weapon—once a healing implement of the scholar-priest, its gentle power was turned and twisted as his ideals and resolve were tested, and faltered. With its wielder long passed, perhaps it can finally be absolved of the atrocities committed by his hand... and remember the peace it has long forgotten.

Harsh Noise.lore: Corkian technology was not the first to create an item that is capable  of recording noise. Artifacts from Time Valley were found to record ambient  sounds and distort them into ear-splitting sonic bursts.

Temporal Lantern.lore: No eyes see past the dark fog that enshrouds the future. But if you could perhaps light the way, what would you see? Invigorating hope? Or a warning to be heeded?

Mephistophelian.lore: When the two opposing Realms come to blows, War lashes out with blind enmity. Such is the nature of a Devil, each born from the hate those two Beasts bear.

majorIds.Faustian Gambit: +Faustian Gambit: Frog Dance triggers only once but has increased vertical velocity, damage, and knockback

Thriller.lore: "And no one's going to save us from the beasts about to strike. We've seen horrors stare us in the eyes, and we're fighting for our lives." -Poe, Nemract Sewer Dweller

Macabre.lore: "Only the most wicked in Gavel could dream of a circumstance as what plagues this Wynn province." -King of Ragni

Aftershock.lore: The Fracturing brought Ahms into a shattered sky, sundering cliffs into an archipelago against the void. The tremors that linger carry an ancient power, bringing mountains to heel with ease and leaving devastation in its wake.

Immolation.lore: The act of self-immolation is never taken lightly, and is always a sacrifice. This idol was carved to honor one such instance, in which a master of flame burned through his life force in a final act of heroism—purging an encroaching army of the undead, saving the people of the jungle from destruction.

Fractal.lore: Curious, isn't it, that unending complexity can feel so plain in one's hand, yet pull deeper than eyes can see and minds can fathom?

Infused Hive Relik.lore: Deceptively plain-looking, this relik has been infused with energy from all five known elements. The head gleams in a spectrum of colors.

Hadal.lore: Carved from unknown parts of a sea creature unseen, the goliath scales of this effigy of the deep bring forth...a pull. A weight, a pressure. A terrible, crushing depth brought onto the holder, blanketing them like nostalgia. Their owner watches, part of itself acutely aware of its missing pieces.

Skull Breaker.lore: "Even a corrupted would get crushed by one of these!" -Roche 'Stone-thrower' Diamant, Ragni Citizen

Olux's Prized Spear.lore: This expertly crafted spear was forged by a cryptid-researching fanatic. It shines brilliantly in even the weakest sunlight.

The Berserk.lore: Forged from unbreakable obsidian eras ago, this heavy hammer has crushed many foes with a single swing.

Karma.lore: "When payback is the rule of the land, it feels safest to do nothing."  -Ormrod, Self-exiled Almuj Resident

Zephra Shredder.lore: Combined power of inscribed Uth runes and sheer rage intertwine to create a fearsome sight, as this weapon is merely a spiritual extension of the user's desire for total destruction.

Helm Splitter.lore: One of Skien's many deadly weapons. This warhammer, despite the massive weight of the hammerhead, was able to be swung by Skien fast enough to be a blur.

Fierte.lore: Only the most honourable warriors of Gavel's army are presented the fearsome, fiery spear forged from the rarest metals of the Molten Heights.

Hero.lore: Enigmatically, this weapon will only show itself to those who believe themselves to be worth nothing, or to be weak. While utilizing this weapon will greatly strengthen one's resolve, it will disappear when it is no longer needed, going to the next wielder.

majorIds.Saviour\u2019s Sacrifice: +Saviour’s Sacrifice: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 15% bonus damage and defence

Sanies.lore: "Can anyone else understand that General Graken? Because I can't." -Commander Takan, Nemract Militia

majorIds.Overwhelm: +Overwhelm: Bash will hit +2 times

Upgraded Steel Buster.lore: It is significantly heavier than usual...you can't tell if that is good or not, in this case.

Tisaun's Proof.lore: The wear upon this broken old battle spear does not affect its ability in battle. The souls of a thousand fallen warriors resound within it.

Remikas' Righteousness.lore: Despite this mace never seeing use by Remikas, it was seen as a symbol of the might of his rule over Gavel. Its true abilities in battle have never been seen.

Bloodbath.lore: Blood. Carnage. Death. Destruction. This is all Annihilation knows. A fury written into its very core, a violent rage building from an endless War. If it were to have its way, all of Wynn would fall to chaos.

Toaster.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] This peculiar weapon was once wielded by the firey warrior Igbar, who used it to great effect in endurance competitions.

Idol.lore: Intricate carvings and images, almost like that of a totem pole, cover the shaft of this marvelous trident, dredged up from the Seavale Reef. Foreign magics heighten the senses of its user in battle, but also instills a longing for the ocean. Many have succumbed to this urge and drowned themselves.

Scythe.lore: A psychopath claiming herself to be Death incarnate used this dark-bladed scythe on a killing spree that lasted over a year. It reaped hundreds of lives, including her own.

majorIds.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals ÓÄÅ -15% per hit.

Infused Hive Spear.lore: Deceptively plain-looking, this spear has been infused with energy from all five known elements. Its tip shimmers in a spectrum of colors.

Bedruthan.lore: Stone shorn from mountains by the roiling sea gathered on the shores of Llevigar one day, washed onto the sand in the shape of a massive spear. It was taken as an omen, and the stones were forged into a true weapon.

Proxima.lore: This spear is bright enough that it can cause blindness if you look directly at it. Its immense power is limited by its weight; the weapon is nearly impossible to lift.

Fissure.lore: Dwarven folklore tells of this mighty maul, used by gods to break mountains, shape continents, and crack the earth to form caverns.

majorIds.Temblor: +Temblor: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 25% faster

Pulsar.lore: The density of this weapon is almost immeasurable. Despite being light and easy to wield, the spear seems to have its own gravitational pull, slowly dragging enemies closer and making it nearly impossible to put down.

majorIds.Tackle: +Tackle: Flying Kick deals much more knockback and Collide deals much more damage on impact.

The Swordfish.lore: The ocean's bounty is full of many strange things. Sailor's tales of a peculiar fish with a snout like a sword and the unbelievable stories of its power thus inspired fanciful ideas in blacksmiths. The results speak for themselves.

Alkatraz.lore: Soul-locking magic is one outlawed by Gavellian governments, only used by the most insidious and cruel of mages. One such enchantment looms dormant in this mundane-looking maul. Continued usage of the weapon threatens to release it upon the wielder, permanently binding them to the weapon.

Maltic's Old Spear.lore: This short spear was the first weapon to be produced by the villagers for sale. They are old, but strong.

Divergence.lore: Strangers held together by shared past, entwined in a fray, never to unite again.

Clash Hook.lore: The wear on this humble war pick's blade has only made it more effective in combat, allowing its users to make unexpected parries of opponents' attacks by hooking and hitting through the weapon.

Sting.lore: "I swear on my life those spiders were covered in spikes! Go out there, see if I'm wrong!" -Suri, Elemental Researcher

Blade of Purity.lore: The creator of this polished white blade insists that its true power will never be unlocked, for only those who are not influenced by the elements of the world know truly how to utilize it.

Thrundacrack.lore: The raw aspect of thunder, though claimed to be harnessed by a mage in a wand, has only been truly tamed by this mighty blade. Combined electric and life-draining magic intertwine and bring forth the truest, most frightening power of all Thunder.

Chaleur.lore: This blackiron blade was left to sear in the desert for months on end by a fanatical berserker. It burned him alive as he cut down those who opposed him.

Guardian.lore: A vow of protection hangs over this spear, now inhabited by the spirit of a legendary heroine. Even simply a glimpse of the burning blade will instill a feeling of protection and security, and that feeling will hold true if one is brave enough to wield it.

majorIds.Guardian: +Guardian: 35% of damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you

majorIds.Last Resort: +Last Resort: Bloodlust has doubled corrupted scaling and knockback, but deals ÓÄÖ -50% ÓÄÇ -30%

Cathedral.lore: "The gravestone for the brother of that man, Sayleros? For whatever reason, it didn't have a proper name on it." -Sacre, Saint's Row Priest

Tidebinder.lore: This mysterious, half-liquid trident apparently holds the secret magics to control the ocean's ebb and flow. It is incapable of touching solid ground.

Harwrol.lore: The runes carved onto the spear shift appearance so quickly as to be illegible, but those who wield it supposedly will learn their meaning.

majorIds.Paragon: +Paragon: Shield Strike deals ÓÄÖ 300% damage. Mantle of the Bovemist's cooldown is significantly reduced, but is limited to one shield charge.

Corpse.lore: "Catch a fresh-raised corrupted, it's like catching a soldier without his morning coffee. Stumbly and unfocused." -Enzan, Retired Ragni Soldier

Rikter.lore: Named for an ancient Wynnic word for "Earthquake", this mighty battle hammer causes the very bones of struck enemies to rattle and heave as though the earth itself was splitting under their feet.

Convergence.lore: As the void approaches nearer and nearer, the barrier between realms thins almost to a point... And yet, no matter how far you fall or how fast you fly, it will always lie just out of reach. Such is the indeterminate nature of the void, and its power that you harness.

Fierce Thunder.lore: Every time this spear hits an enemy, a sharp electrical jolt hits the users hands that forces powerful lightning to release.

Upgraded Vartija.lore: The guard on the spear is smaller, but at least twice as thick. What purpose does that have?

Maul.lore: "If you squish a spider egg, sometimes little spiders pop out. So, squish the whole area instead!" -Captain Fenor, Detlas Legion

Sol.lore: "The sun and related symbols appear quite often in these ancient glyphs.  Interesting, but unsurprising, no?" -Svin, Legend Keeper

Kahontsi Ohstyen.lore: Wielded by the chief of the Tromsian jungle's zombie tribes, the augmentable crystals within it focus natural elemental energies to intense levels.

Apocalypse.lore: To forge a weapon such as this from the cursed lava of the portal basin requires dozens, for each smith would lose themselves to the force of corruption before it is finished. The nightmarishly hooked blade serves no purpose but destruction, as intended.

majorIds.Hellfire: +Hellfire: Bash becomes one giant 250% damage hit, and Boiling Blood burns faster and stronger but can't slow

Ignition.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] Forged with flaming scales shorn from Ozoth, the fabled Golden Ninja of the Canyon of the Lost hunted his prey relentlessly using this lightweight, yet harder than steel, polearm.

majorIds.Rally: +Rally: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless
+Rally: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless

Braker.lore: Seems like the name is misspelled a little bit.

Upgraded Archpriest.lore: It seems stronger at first glance, but upon closer inspection the blade is rather...soft?

Collapse.lore: Despite the light weight of the weapon, the spearhead has been made from incredibly dense cosmic stone. A strong enough impact can directly destroy matter. Due to this danger, it is sought after to be destroyed.

majorIds.Fission: +Fission: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong

Legendary Smasher.lore: Many have tried to duplicate the properties of this spear, but very few have succeeded in enchanting a spearhead with explosive magic that does not cause the spear itself to explode.

Adherence.lore: Adherence to the laws of good is important- it’s why one fights the spread of corruption, after all. Though whether to follow the spirit or the letter… perhaps they too can be bent to your will.

Millennium.lore: Cosmic energy permeates this deceptively dull-looking chestplate, having been crafted with stardust from a comet that only passes over Wynn every 1000 years.

Ragni's Mail.lore: One of the few remaining standard issue mails that were used against the first hordes to emerge from the infamous portal over 1000 years ago.

Marius' Prison.lore: "I know the Beast may return one day...but these chains shall bind it for eternity." The inscription glows bright in the darkness.

Erratio.lore: The blind prophet who crafted this macabre breastplate used the bones of only the most ruthless justiciars and executioners. Its wearers are supposedly destined to only die either a heroic or a just death.

Phantasmal Hostage.lore: A soul sacrificed willingly, to an eternity in captivity. Imprints and memories; all that remain of a hero of the lands.

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

Time Rift.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] You only have limited time. But what if, you could experience that time again? And again, and again...

Giant's Bracer.lore: This ill-fitting, bulky chestplate was never intended to be a chestplate at all. Rather, it is a broken fragment of an arm bracer, from the time of giants.

Discoverer.lore: Wealth and riches...but at what cost?

Cage of Bones.lore: The ancient bones of the demon Garaheth are stronger than steel. They clamp down when worn to constrict the bearer, inciting a slow madness.

majorIds.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals ÓÄÅ -15% per hit.

Dead Samurai's Plate.lore: "We get a lot of weirdos coming from Gavel by airship. That plate mail looked unusably ornate!" -Calo, Private Airship Operator

Anima-Infused Cuirass.lore: Infused with the classical magicks of fire, water, and thunder, this ornately-crafted chestplate is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

Purple Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "ICY you looking at my fancy duds" knitted onto the front.

Arakadicus' Body.lore: Long strips of chitin discarded from the mother of spiders Arakadicus still contain traces of her wicked powers, but few have survived the attempts to harvest them.

Aquarius.lore: “The symbol of the river” is a name that is often synonymous with this garment, with many water like qualities surrounding it, heavily bathed in magical meaning.

Katoa's Warmth.lore: Brilliantly golden as the crops from the humble farm, its mere presence fills stomachs and brings comfort, but only to those who are modest and generous.

requirements.quest: Realm of Light III - A Headless History

Indigo Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "GRAUPELING with a second helping of Craftmas feast" knitted onto the front.

Web Plate.lore: "I just need a little more spider silk to finish this vest!" -Lacrona, Detlas Tailor, found eaten by Nivla spiders

White Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "SNOW way Craftmas can be bad in this sweater" knitted onto the front.

Yellow Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "YELLOW- How's your Craftmas going" knitted onto the front.

majorIds.Magnet: +Magnet: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you

Gravity.lore: No one knows how this extremely dense chestplate can even logically exist. It is almost paradoxical in nature, and affects its wearers in unfathomable ways.

majorIds.Strings of Fate: +Strings of Fate: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds, and deal double damage with attacks and explosions.

Leo.lore: This thick skinned jacket, imbued with the courage of a thousand lion hearts, will grant the user massive protection from all who target them.

Twilight-Gilded Cloak.lore: An ephemeral moment in time captured by sheer force of magic, this ornately-crafted cloak is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

majorIds.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals ÓÄÅ -15% per hit.

Garoth's Hope.lore: "Strangest thing, it turns out Creepers are incredibly flammable..." -Garull, Cryptid Researcher

Scarlet Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Why be merry? CLAUS I said so" knitted onto the front.

Orange Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "ORANGE you glad I showed up for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.

Dondasch.lore: The sheer bond between Adamastor and Urdar has manifested itself into a physical form due to their duress. Such power is not to be abused...

Enhanced Zeal.lore: Supposedly this chestplate belonged to a legendary paladin. The merchant has no explanation for why there are dozens of them.

Adamantite.lore: Adamantite is a soft metal often added to exotic medicine to increase one's health, but a revolutionary blacksmith on Black Road, created a chestplate with an Adamantite alloy, which is advertised to bolster the users endurance.

Brown Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "YULE see me smiling this season" knitted onto the front.

Nemract's Ruin.lore: This chestplate was originally created as a memorial ornament to the lost lives of Ancient Nemract before being reforged into a powerful piece of armor for Nemract's guard.

Green Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'm feeling PINE, what about you" knitted onto the front.

Mummy's Rag.lore: The accursed mummy once wore this robe as a great pharaoh of the desert. It has long since rotted, leaving only a cursed shell of its former greatness.

Bob's Battle Chestplate.lore: This battered chestplate was once worn by the legendary Wynnic protector, Bob, during the fearsome corrupted sieges before he gave it away to an old friend. An air of melancholy hangs over it.

Andesite Aegis.lore: Andesite is a stone commonly used for weapons and construction, but tends to be ineffective as armor when impure. This sturdy chestplate, however, is testament to the strength of pure andesite.

Cinfras Souvenir T-Shirt.lore: The shirt has the quote "I went to the Letvus Airbase in Cinfras and all I got was this lousy T-shirt" printed on it.

Black Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Prepare for a FLURRY of Craftmas spirit" knitted onto the front.

Abdomen.lore: "...But under no circumstances should you stand directly behind an attacking spider. While not a universal trait, some spiders are capable of ejecting webs from their spinneret, leaving assailants and victims helpless." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3

Red Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'll never give you the COLD SHOULDER" knitted onto the front.

Elysium-Engraved Aegis.lore: Dedicated to a place of courage revered by all warriors, this ornately-crafted chestplate is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

Booster Plate.lore: A marvel of Corkus' electromagical advancements, this high-tech chestplate is equipped with steam jets to boost the user's speed, at a minimal cost to protection.

majorIds.Alter Ego: +Alter Ego: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.

Phantasmal Remnants.lore: Memories take on lives of their own, left long enough.

Springtrap.lore: "After nearly getting trapped in an iron maiden, I figure I can study  those mummies just as well from home." -Achper, Almuj Archaeologist

Pink Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Going HAM on Craftmas dinner tonight" knitted onto the front.

Pine Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Let me NICK a few extra cookies for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.

majorIds.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health

The Jingling Jester.lore: Jingle jangle, while shaking your bells. Jingle jangle come the pockets of cash... Catch the trickster, send them to hell," their money is gone and off you've dashed!

majorIds.Soul Eater: +Soul Eater: Devour and Harvester grant double mana. Decreases maximum marks by 1.

Taurus.lore: The hide of the Touroto, an almost invincible Bull-like creature, is said to be pierced only by the horn of the Touroto itself, making it extremely valuable.

majorIds.Rock Shield: +Rock Shield: Arrow Shield's defense is increased by 10%, but its number of charges is reduced by 1.

Beige Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "All STOCKINGED up for the season" knitted onto the front.

majorIds.Meteor Crash: +Meteor Crash: Burning Sigil deals more damage in a massively increased radius, but lasts half as long.

Enhanced Icarus.lore: Apparently, gluing some feathers on top of the decorative armor wings is supposed to allow you to fly- so says the merchant, at least.

Blessed Wrappings.lore: The thick, Bovemist-sanctified cloth is worn by their priests during certain religious ceremonies. It clears the mind and purifies the body.

Enhanced Copper Plate.lore: The merchant insists that the wear and oxidation on the armor "is a feature."

Sawdust.lore: Once cursed by a druid who had his grove chopped away by a greedy Villager, it was then purified and mass-produced for sale as armor, to the druid's utter disappointment.

Tisaun's Valor.lore: Tisaun, a warrior tasked to fend off a corrupted siege alone, could find only a thin shirt and rusted spear to use before the attack. He defeated all 1000 enemies without taking a scratch, and his bravery infused his gear with that same strength.

Libra.lore: Before the invention of magical weight detectors, there was a giant pair of public scales in Cinfras. Instead of being thrown away, they were reforged to be a formidable piece of armour.

Cardiac Arrest.lore: ...As the heart fails, adrenaline pumps through the body in an attempt to provide energy and keep the victim alive, but medical action must be taken to ensure survival. -Excerpt from Aldorei Medical Tomes, Vol. 6

Soul Ink.lore: Taken from the Archwraith by a pious Shaman, this chestplate was immediately abandoned. Its few users since have turned to an all-consuming desire to seek out and realign the last vestiges of purity remaining in the Kander Forest.

Ribcage.lore: "...as intimidating as the name sounds, you want your organs to be trapped in this kind of cage." -Excerpt from Human Anatomy For Fools, Cirh Nettan

majorIds.Saviour\u2019s Sacrifice: +Saviour’s Sacrifice: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 15% bonus damage and defence

majorIds.Lunge: +Lunge: Hop and Leap's horizontal velocity is greatly increased

Wanderlust.lore: Are your heart, soul, and mind one? The ones who love are the most vulnerable. The ones who persist are the most detached. The ones who forget are the most naive. Only when you remove these impurities from your body could you reach the end.

Mutilated Corpse.lore: Freshly slain foes in well below freezing conditions often provide enough warmth to weather the storm. However, this Corrupted seems to still be alive in some sickening way, draining life force to sustain itself. It's pulling towards something.

Matryoshka Shell.lore: The armor worn by the enigmatic Matryoshka Idol. It appears to have a nearly uncountably high number of inlets and sockets set inside.

majorIds.Sublimation: +Sublimation: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount, with reduced Totem area of effect

Cerulean Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "SLOPE to SKI you again next Craftmas" knitted onto the front.

majorIds.Plague: +Plague: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

Hetusol.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] The make of this massive cloak is unlike anything seen before among the provinces. Foreign images shift and melt in ethereal projections within the inside.

Enhanced Phosphene.lore: The paintjob on the armor is incredibly garish. Who thinks to combine sea green, mud, hot pink, and neon yellow?

Blue Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Don't feel BLUE- It's Craftmas!" knitted onto the front.

majorIds.Temblor: +Temblor: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 25% faster

Chimaera.lore: The one true Chimera in existence is sought by many, for great stories are told of its gifts to the worthy. One such gift was a simple fur coat, which gave the wearer but a taste of its power.

majorIds.Mangle: +Mangle: Lacerate will deal +1 slash

Disfigured Vessel.lore: An imperfect fit, but you can make a better one.

Vampiric Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Vampiric Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Oceanic Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Oceanic Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Pulsing Tome of Defensive Mastery I.internalName: Pulsing Tome of Defensive Mastery I

Blooming Tome of Defensive Mastery I.internalName: Blooming Tome of Defensive Mastery I

Clouded Tome of Defensive Mastery I.internalName: Clouded Tome of Defensive Mastery I

Blooming Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Blooming Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Courageous Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Courageous Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Pulsing Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Pulsing Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Everlasting Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Everlasting Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Oceanic Tome of Defensive Mastery I.internalName: Oceanic Tome of Defensive Mastery I

Clouded Tome of Defensive Mastery II.internalName: Clouded Tome of Defensive Mastery II

Courageous Tome of Defensive Mastery I.internalName: Courageous Tome of Defensive Mastery I

Grillface.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] The old facemasks of the Eradian guards were forged from raw magma, and enchanted to remain searingly hot, so as to brand the wearer eternally with the mark of Rodoroc's elite.

Bovine Killer.lore: This helmet was worn long ago by an infamous assassin who plagued Bovemist sites for decades. It was crafted of the still-bloody skin of their most prized and worshiped cows.

The Forgery.lore: While only a mockery of the original product, this line of helmets became wildly popular before legal disputes and safety concerns halted production.

Outlandish Replica Face Mask of Legendar.internalName: Outlandish Replica Face Mask of Legendary Victory
Outlandish Replica Face Mask of Legendar.lore: This perfect-to-the-point-of-indistinguishability replica mask of Herbert von Legendary's face, painstakingly crafted by Corkus's most powerful machines with only the most expensive materials and featuring real moustache hair plucked from Doctor Legendary's face, is desperately handed over to attempt to placate those who have spent an unnecessary amount of time completing the Legendary Challenge, broken the mold by continuing to spend an unnecessary amount of time completing the Legendary Challenge, gone even further beyond spending unnecessary amounts of time completing the Legendary Challenge, pushed onward to prove that they will not stop spending unnecessary amounts of time completing the Legendary Challenge, and then ultimately garnered an unhealthy obsession for spending unnecessary amounts of time completing the Legendary Challenge.

Pelier.lore: Occasional whisperings can be heard by the wearers of this stone mask, reforged from a phylactery of souls. Although not dangerous, staring into the eyes of the mask can bring fear of one's soul being trapped within.

majorIds.Napalm: +Napalm: Fire Creep increases Arrow Bomb damage and self-damage but reduces velocity. Scorched Earth damage and radius are increased.

majorIds.Fright or Flight: +Fright or Flight: Plays spooky tunes

Dune Beast Jaw.lore: "We're trying to dig up history, not horrors! What is wrong with this province?!"  -Excavator Vade, WynnExcavation Site A Director

Cephalothorax.lore: "...Most of their vital organs, however, are located in the bulbous abdomen. If you've enough crushing force with your weapon, it may be a quicker alternative for the kill. ..." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3

Spectre.lore: The dark spectres of the decayed forests have created an insidious helmet to drain the spirit of those who wear it, and become servants to their dark whims. Many have fallen to its allure.

Black Ripper.lore: "The skeletons at Ancient Nemract are rotted! is it even physically possible to rot a bone?" -Laen, Nemract Librarian

Obsidian-Framed Helmet.lore: Made of dark minerals and adorned with pure obsidian, this ornately-crafted helmet is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

majorIds.Plague: +Plague: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

Stifling Spores.lore: The beauty of this peculiar grotto takes your breath away. Unfortunately, its spores do too...

Aphotic.lore: This dark relic was found at the very bottom of the deepest trench of the ocean. It drains all light surrounding it, blinding everything in a strange abyssal darkness.

majorIds.Festive Spirit: +Festive Spirit: Plays wintery tunes

Shinespark.lore: There have been many attempts to create a reliable power system in Llevigar, and this plasma-charged helmet was reforged from a notable prototype.

Conflagrate.lore: Donning this helmet sears your mind with images of a world on fire. These blistering thoughts pressure you to make that world a reality.

Shawl of Gaea.lore: Despite being thin enough to blow away in the wind, this mineral-blended shawl holds the force of a supervolcano within its soft fabric.

Treasured Diamond Mask of Legendary Vict.internalName: Treasured Diamond Mask of Legendary Victory
Treasured Diamond Mask of Legendary Vict.lore: This excessively ornate to-the-point-of-being-wasteful decorative mask, laser-cut from a meter's worth of pure diamond, is given to those who have spent an unnecessary amount of time completing the Legendary Challenge, broken the mold by continuing to spend an unnecessary amount of time completing the Legendary Challenge, gone even further beyond spending unnecessary amounts of time completing the Legendary Challenge, and then pushed onward to prove that they will not stop spending unnecessary amounts of time completing the Legendary Challenge.

majorIds.Alter Ego: +Alter Ego: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.

majorIds.Hawkeye: +Hawkeye: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal ÓÄÖ 10%, ÓÄÉ 1%, and ÓÄÄ 1%

Little Inferno.lore: It is cold to the touch until worn. Once donned, it engulfs the wearer in excruciatingly hot flames, but never shall the wearer burn; only their enemies will feel the pain of the fire.

Mask of the Spirits.lore: Not all who roam may find their way home. Others lose themselves in the world... And find a new way forward.

Butterfly.lore: "Time travel cares less about small things like a flapping wing, and more about big things, like becoming your own grandfather." -Martyn, Time Valley Resident

Boreal-Patterned Crown.lore: Engraved with the beauty and mystery of the boreal lights, this ornately-crafted crown is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.
